description: Stable regression benchmark queries for search quality testing

queries.intent: Find documentation or examples of Zod schema validation
Find how to use refine() method for custom validation logic in Zod schemas
Find patterns for error handling middleware in Express applications
Find documentation on how to define and use route parameters in Express
Find how to verify JWT tokens for authentication
Understand the difference between decoding and verifying JWT tokens
Find how to use constraints with TypeScript generics
Find documentation and examples of mapped types in TypeScript
Find how to properly use cleanup functions in useEffect hook
Understand how dependency arrays work in React hooks
Find how to use wildcard routes in Hono web framework
Compare performance characteristics between Hono and Express frameworks
Find how to handle errors in Node.js stream pipelines
Understand how backpressure works in Node.js readable streams
Compare parse and safeParse methods in Zod for error handling approaches
